cv.author: Olli-Antti Kivilahti
cv.title: What can I do?
cv.text:
Koha
Liferay
Guard
Cook's aide
Construction worker
Carpenter's aide

bio.author: Olli-Antti Kivilahti
bio.title: Another dark tale
bio.text: I was born. Like most of us.
